Interface UserToken

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Token

    public interface UserToken
    A simple interface to the token data structure that will be returned by a group server. You will need to develop a class that implements this interface so that your code can interface with the tokens created by your group server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGroups()
      This method extracts the list of groups that the owner of this token has access to.
      java.lang.String getIssuer()
      This method should return a string describing the issuer of this token.
      java.lang.String getSubject()
      This method should return a string indicating the name of the subject of the token.

    • Method Detail

      • getIssuer

        java.lang.String getIssuer()
        This method should return a string describing the issuer of this token. This string identifies the group server that created this token. For instance, if "Alice" requests a token from the group server "Server1", this method will return the string "Server1".
        Returns:
        The issuer of this token

      • getSubject

        java.lang.String getSubject()
        This method should return a string indicating the name of the subject of the token. For instance, if "Alice" requests a token from the group server "Server1", this method will return the string "Alice".
        Returns:
        The subject of this token

      • getGroups

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getGroups()
        This method extracts the list of groups that the owner of this token has access to. If "Alice" is a member of the groups "G1" and "G2" defined at the group server "Server1", this method will return ["G1", "G2"].
        Returns:
        The list of group memberships encoded in this token
